trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: 디코더에서 반환하여 인코더에서 받아들이는 이미지 데이터를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 에 정의 되지 않은 추가 기능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> 에 대 한 액세스를 제공 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> 연결 된 이미지의 특정 프레임입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 또한를 사용 하 여 메타 데이터 정보를 기록 하는 작업을 지원는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> 속성 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 에서 반환 된 디코더는 항상 고정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 복사본을 먼저 만들어야 수정 가능한 복사본을 필요한 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: 만 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 형식 이미지 여러 프레임을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에는 새 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> 를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 열려는 개체는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 그래픽 및 쓰기 메타 데이터를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의되면 현재 컨텍스트의 기본 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.

When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의되면 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />과 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 개체의 읽기 전용 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> based on the supplied arguments.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that is used to construct the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: `bitmapStream` 후 프레임을 만든 경우에만 닫을 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> 캐시 옵션을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> 프레임 필요할 때까지 캐시 옵션 스트림을 보유 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> 만들기 및 캐시 옵션을 지정 하는 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 생성 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 에서 주어진 <xref:System.Uri>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The source from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 축소판 그림을 사용하여 주어진 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />에서 새 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
The stream from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />을 만드는 데 사용되는 캐시 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />을 사용하여 주어진 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />에서 새 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> 캐시 옵션을를 닫으려면는 `bitmapStream` 비트맵을 만든 후 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> 비트맵 필요 하 고 정리는 가비지 수집기에서 처리 될 때까지 캐시 옵션 스트림에 대 한 액세스를 보유 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />을 만드는 데 사용되는 캐시 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />을 사용하여 주어진 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />을 만드는 데 사용되는 캐시 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.

<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
The metadata to associate with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 미리 보기, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />를 사용하여 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />에서 새 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, which can be used to associate metadata with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의된 경우 메타데이터를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />과 연결하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.

Metadata can only be added or edited using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 메타 데이터 또는 추가할 수만 사용 하 여 편집할는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> 이미지 파일에는 새 메타 데이터에 대 한 충분 한 공간이 그렇지 않으면 메타 데이터를 추가할 수 있는지를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 열려는 개체는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 그래픽 및 쓰기 메타 데이터를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의되면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />와 연결된 디코더를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의된 경우 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />과 연결된 미리 보기 이미지를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents a thumbnail of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
